item.description:
Yum, Burger night !

$6 Dollar burgers - a great selection of gourmet burgers and yummy onion rings. Otherwise a full menu and good selection of draft beers and Celtic Libations.

Please don't RSVP and not show up. We will make reservations and I don't want to ovebook. Sometimes they will bring in extra staff just for us.

p.s. - I liked the burger with Peanut butter and pickles...
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask for the meetup group

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: $6 Burgers & Beers at the Kinsale Inn - Mattapoisett
